snippet.title: Escape the Boardgame- Teaser - Playdate
snippet.description:
From the creators of the award-winning Escape the Arcade comes a new nostalgic adventure!

This time, the journey takes you into the world of old-school board games, where nothing is as it seems.

Escape the Boardgame is a playful and mind-bending mix of escape room puzzles and visual storytelling - packed with mysteries and humor.
The Story

Sarah and Alex meet for their first friend-date at a quirky board game café, where they’re welcomed by a mysterious woman, Eleanor. In the middle of their game of chess, lightning strikes, lights are out, and in the candle light, they are shrinked to chess-piece size!

Now, they must navigate through a long series of classic board game themed puzzles to escape the café and return to their normal size.

Enjoy this wholesome journey, immersing yourself in illustrations and puzzles.

Coming soon on Playdate!
https://play.date/games/escape-the-boardgame/

Made by:

    Julie Bjørnskov: Idea, Art and Music
    Anders Bjørnskov: Programming

Credits

Built with Panels by Cadin Batrack.
